00181                             NS_SNMP OctetStr &viewName);
00182   void          incUnknownContexts(); 
00183   NS_SNMP SnmpInt32     getUnknownContexts();
00184   static char*  getErrorMsg(int nr) { return vacmErrs[nr];};
00185 
00186   boolean       addNewContext(const NS_SNMP OctetStr &newContext);

00189                             const NS_SNMP OctetStr& groupName, int storageType);

00192                                   const NS_SNMP OctetStr& prefix,

00194                                   int match, const NS_SNMP OctetStr& readView, 
00195                                   const NS_SNMP OctetStr& writeView,
00196                                   const NS_SNMP OctetStr& notifyView, int storageType);
00197   void deleteAccessEntry(const NS_SNMP OctetStr& groupName,
00198                          const NS_SNMP OctetStr& prefix, 
00199                          int securityModel, int securityLevel);
00200   boolean       addNewView(const NS_SNMP OctetStr& viewName, const Oidx& subtree, 
00201                            const NS_SNMP OctetStr& mask, int type, int storageType);
00202   void deleteView(const NS_SNMP OctetStr& viewName, const Oidx& subtree);
00203 
00211   VacmClassPointers get_vacm_tables() { return vcp; }
